comment.author: 58258216@N03
comment._content: The tallest buildings in the picture are the Royal York Hotel on the left and on the right it is the Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce (tallest building in the city at the time).

comment.author: 15456017@N05
comment._content: At one time the Royal York Hotel was the tallest building in the British Empire. It is still a functioning, luxury hotel today (2012).
